group_1.textRight: You did what you needed to, Komachi.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... It still sucks, though.
There could be ancient nobles that nobody knows@about buried under that hill...
There could be evidence of all those people who@lived in that era, but...

group_1.textRight: ...So it was a kofun after all, then?

group_1.textLeft: The professor seems to think so.
At the very least, he said it's valuable enough@to try excavating it.
*Si~gh*... I really wanted to see it.

group_1.textRight: You really are perfect researcher material.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: You haven't said a word about "oh, I wish I@could've been named as its discoverer!".

group_1.textLeft: True... all I've said is that I want to see it,@know about it.
The protagonists of history are the people who@actually lived through it, after all... not us researchers.
Maybe I could've made it in time if I'd tried@harder from the start...?
...Yeah.

group_1.textCenter: It seems you're having some trouble.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hm? What was that voice just now...?
Huh...? What's this animal?
I can't imagine we're both experiencing the same@auditory *and* visual hallucinations...

group_1.textRight: Although there aren't very many girls who can see@me.

group_1.narration: The creature introduced itself as "Kyubey,"@and informed us...
...That we had the potential to become Magical Girls.
And that, in exchange for bearing the duty@of fighting monsters called Witches...
He'd be able to grant us any one wish.

group_1.textLeft: ...A contract that can grant any wish.
That certainly sounds like a rather demonic sort@of proposition.
Kyubey, is all this stuff you're saying true?

group_1.textRight: Of course it's all true, Mikura Komachi.
Do you have a wish that you'd like to be granted?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes.
I want to know.
About the thoughts and feelings of those ancient@people, who might be buried in history soon...
Who might be forgotten without anyone ever@knowing about them...

group_1.textRight: Komachi, wait. Are you seriously going to make@that contract?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. If this is true, and I let this chance@go...
I know for a fact that I'll regret it even more.
So.
I want... to make the excavation of that kofun@a reality.
I want to feel the breath of those people@buried in history!
Huh...? ...From the curator?
Hmm...
[chara:303801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]HUH?!
He says the university's officially scheduled@the excavation!
Yeah!

group_1.textRight: But what about the budget committee?

group_1.textLeft: He said that the professor and a council member@who was in his class got to work on it...
And the bypass construction might be completely@canceled!
No way. It really worked...
Haha...!
